lines.text: You don't think... he tried to cast it on this blood somehow?
Eh? Why would I think that?
I meant like, the rhetorical you. Obviously, you don't have the keen eyes I've got, or I wouldn't have to point it out.
''Keen eyes''? Kid, can you even see anything past all that hair?
M-most of the time! Gimme a break!
Anyway... blood is technically part of a person, but is it ''flesh''?
Don't people usually say ''flesh and blood'', like those are two different things?
I was thinking maybe trying to cast it on disembodied blood would make it backfire, but...
...well, he probably wouldn't try to do that while it was still in the bottle.
He also probably wouldn't try to do it, because there's no conceivable reason he'd want to.
